blogPost.excerpt: Onrise helps you to build nano habits and work more effectively. Standing on the latest research about behavior design and productivity, Onrise is your guide to achieve your goals. Give it a try and become the person you aspire to be!
blogPost.body: Onrise helps you to build nano habits and work more effectively. Standing on the latest research about behavior design and productivity, Onrise is your guide to achieve your goals. Give it a try and become the person you aspire to be!
blogPost.title: Onrise - Build nano habits to become the person you aspire to be
blogPost.author: Bruno Recht

localize.description: OnRise帮助你养成纳米习惯，让你的工作更有效率。站在关于行为设计和生产力的最新研究上，OnRise是你实现目标的指南。试一试，成为你渴望成为的人！
localize.tagline: 养成纳米习惯，成为你渴望成为的人

localize.description: OnRise幫助你養成納米習慣，讓你的工作更有效率。站在關於行爲設計和生產力的最新研究上，OnRise是你實現目標的指南。試一試，成爲你渴望成爲的人！
localize.tagline: 養成納米習慣，成爲你渴望成爲的人

previous.excerpt: My Wolfpack is a friendly app that microgroups people according to their interests. If you are not particularly looking for dating but don’t want to meet people in huge groups that forbids you to really get to know them, you are in the right place.
previous.title: My Wolfpack - Meet new friends according to your interests in micro-groups

localize.description: My Wolfpack是一款友好的应用程序，可以根据人们的兴趣对他们进行微分组。如果你不是特别想要约会，但又不想结识一大群阻碍你真正了解他们的人，那你就来对地方了。
localize.tagline: 根据你在微群中的兴趣结识新朋友

localize.description: My Wolfpack是一款友好的應用程序，可以根據人們的興趣對他們進行微分組。如果你不是特別想要約會，但又不想結識一大羣阻礙你真正瞭解他們的人，那你就來對地方了。
localize.tagline: 根據你在微羣中的興趣結識新朋友

next.excerpt: Managing multiple social accounts can be stressful and time-consuming. Share the same content to all your accounts at once with just a click of a button. Crosspost App frees you from having to do all that manual work, saving over 50% of your time for other important tasks. https://crossxpost.app/
next.title: Crosspost App - Share your content to several social platforms in one click

localize.description: 管理多个社交账户可能既有压力又耗时。只需单击一个按钮，即可将相同的内容一次性共享给您的所有帐户。Crosspost App将您从必须做的所有手工工作中解放出来，为其他重要任务节省了超过50%的时间。https://crossxpost.app/
localize.tagline: 一键将您的内容共享到多个社交平台

localize.description: 管理多個社交賬戶可能既有壓力又耗時。只需單擊一個按鈕，即可將相同的內容一次性共享給您的所有帳戶。Crosspost App將您從必須做的所有手工工作中解放出來，爲其他重要任務節省了超過50%的時間。https://crossxpost.app/
localize.tagline: 一鍵將您的內容共享到多個社交平臺
